H0.text: What do we call the selfless and virtuous practice of concern for the welfare of others. Altruism

H1.text: What do we call the selfless and virtuous practice of concern for the welfare of others. Philanthropy

H2.text: What do we call the selfless and virtuous practice of concern for the welfare of others. Humanism

H3.text: What do we call the selfless and virtuous practice of concern for the welfare of others. Truist

A4.text: altruism is caring about the welfare of other people and acting to help them, above oneself

A5.text: Altruism is concern for the well-being, the life, of others, independently of personal benefit or reciprocity
